title: Manchester United news: Henrikh Mkhitaryan reveals Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp helped him toughen up | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 1:44 pm Jurgen Klopp is inadvertently behind Henrikh Mkhitaryan’s recovery (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United star Henrikh Mkhitaryan has revealed that Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp made him the player he is today by working on his mentality at Borussia Dortmund. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
The Armenia international has been a key performer for the Red Devils lately, though he had to endure a tough start at Old Trafford after initially failing to break into Jose Mourinho’s first-team plans. 
Still, Mkhitaryan believes the fine work of Klopp at Dortmund taught him how to deal with difficult situations in football, so the Liverpool boss has inadvertently played his own part in the improvement in United’s form since they brought the former Shakhtar Donetsk man into the team. Mkhitaryan has hailed Klopp for improving him at Dortmund (Picture: Getty) Mkhitaryan has got back to his best to make a big impact at United (Picture: Getty) 
‘I am thankful to Klopp. He worked on my personality and the psychological part,’ Mkhitaryan explained.
